welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Seaford! This charming coastal city is known for its picturesque beaches, vibrant community, and delicious seafood. We invite you to explore all that Seaford has to offer and enjoy your stay to the fullest!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport houses all ticketing and baggage claim areas, as well as a variety of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Republic Field Airport offers luxurious amenities and services for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Major international hub for various airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: International flights for British Airways and other airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Domestic and international flights for American Airlines

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport, offering domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for exclusive use by private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
